name: Escape Crazy Train Simulator
description:
Escape crazy simulator is a very intersting game for teen age.in this game you can try to save wild animal from the train incident.wild animal cross the train track where you can save them by stoping the train.every day we see on the road animal incident please protect them.
Realistic sound effect of train.
Beautifull environment.
Realistic train driving.
Challenging level.
